keyword: how many calories in a reeses peanut butter cup
title: How Many Calories in a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Reese's peanut butter cup, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
assumptions: Standard single size (21g), milk chocolate with creamy peanut butter filling; no customizations.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, batch, and manufacturer; values based on standard Hershey's Reese's. Check packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: A standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup contains about 110 calories and 2.7g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Reese's peanut butter cup?
faqs.a: A standard one has about 110 calories.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Reese's peanut butter cup?
faqs.a: Approximately 12g carbs, 7g fat, 2.7g protein, with 10g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a Reese's cup have fiber or trans fat?
faqs.a: About 0.5g fiber and 0g trans fat per cup.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Reese's peanut butter cup?
Are Reese's cups high in saturated fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 3.5g saturated fat per cup, mostly from chocolate and peanut butter.
